author: dag
msg: use a main memory database for some tests for increased speed. It also
changes the way SystemPropertyTestSetup for static properties closes
down the database to not deregister the driver; without this change we
saw a test setup try to connect via the client driver to a Derby server

author: minfrin
msg: mod_auth_form: Make the trace logging consistent through the notes, session

author: desruisseaux
msg: Slight modification of the policy about xlink:href. By default, write XLink attributes even if the metadata object is not nil.
The XLink is then for informative purpose. This change is made on the assumption that this behavior will be less surprising
for the users than omission of the metadata object from the XML output.

author: cziegeler
msg: FELIX-4085 : [Core R5] Implement updates to the Bundle Hook Specification. Apply patch from David Bosschaert
